/* kr.fingate.gs.auth.item.dao.ItemDao.getItemList */ SELECT I.ITEM_NO , I.SYSTEM_CODE , I.AUTH_ITEM_TYPE , I.MENU_NAME , I.ITEM_NAME , I.ITEM_DSCRP , I.FNCTN_ID , I.SYSTEM_APLCT_YN , I.USE_YN , DATE_FORMAT(I.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(I.MOD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS MOD_DATE
, CONCAT(U.USER_NAME, '(', O.ORGNZ_NAME, ')') AS REG_USER_NAME , CONCAT(UM.USER_NAME, '(', OM.ORGNZ_NAME, ')') AS MOD_USER_NAME
FROM GA_ITEM I
LEFT JOIN GA_USER UM ON I.MOD_USER_NO = UM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GA_ORGNZ OM ON OM.ORGNZ_NO = UM.ORGNZ_NO LEFT JOIN GA_USER U ON I.REG_USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GA_ORGNZ O ON O.ORGNZ_NO = U.ORGNZ_NO
ORDER BY I.ITEM_NO DESC
